title: Premium Community
why_this_works: You have {repeat_commenters} regulars who comment on every post - they're already part of your community
Your {engagement_rate}% engagement rate is {engagement_comparison} - audiences this engaged will pay for access
Gaming/streaming audiences are already used to paying for memberships (Twitch subs, Patreon)
{platform} makes launching a community straightforward - you don't need technical skills
Your chat already feels like a community - monetizing this formalizes what already exists

steps.details: Discord: Free, great for real-time chat, familiar to gaming audiences. Circle: $89/mo, premium UX, better for structured content. Consider your audience and budget.
Recommended: Start with single tier ($27-47/month based on your positioning). Can add tiers later. Include founding member discount (30-40% off).

steps.task: Create welcome content and value proposition
steps.details: What do members get? Be specific: 'Weekly Q&As, daily tips, exclusive gameplay sessions' not 'exclusive content'. This justifies your pricing.
Stripe is recommended. Set up recurring billing. Test with a friend before launching.
Build hype 1 week before launch. Preview benefits, showcase founding member deal, create FOMO.

steps.task: Identify and DM top 50 engaged followers
steps.details: Personal invitations convert 10-15x better. Offer founding member discount. These become your launch champions.
Channels: Welcome, General, Game-specific, Off-topic, VIP. Roles based on tiers. Test flow with friends.

steps.task: Create onboarding sequence for new members
steps.details: Automated welcome message, intro post prompt, rules, how to get value. First 24 hours are critical.

steps.task: Launch publicly with founding member offer
steps.details: 3-7 day open enrollment window. Announce across all platforms. Stories every 6 hours. Pin post.
Critical mass needed for community to feel active. Don't launch to empty server.
Scheduled time to play with members. Rotate games. This is the main value prop.
Pop in, react to posts, answer questions. Your presence = value.
Early VOD access, exclusive gameplay, tips, deals. Content non-members can't get.
Shout out active members, play with them, share their clips. Social proof drives signups.
Member-only brackets, prizes (merch, free months). Spikes engagement.
What's working? What do they want more of? Act on feedback fast.
Feature active members, celebrate wins, build belonging. Retention tactic.

steps.task: Create content calendar for next month
steps.details: Plan ahead. Batch content. Consistency beats perfection.

steps.task: Analyze retention data and identify churn patterns
steps.details: Who's staying? Who's leaving? Why? Fix the leaks.
Member gets free month per referral. Unique codes. Track and reward.

steps.task: Add premium tier or expand offerings
steps.details: Once stable, consider higher tier with 1-on-1 coaching or exclusive events.
Special event, tournament, or giveaway. Reward loyalty.
